lead_paragraph: ZAGER--Leya. The Trustees, Officers and staff of Gruss Life Monument Funds and the Center for Initiatives in Jewish Education mourn the passing of Mrs. Leya Zager, ob"m, beloved mother of Mrs. Hannah Cury, mother-in-law of our devoted President and CEO, Jason Cury. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Martin D. Gruss, Chairman Gruss Life Monument Funds 1/3
